replies.body: Getting interview for staff
replies.body_tagged: Getting interview for staff

replies.body:
I had heaps of brilliant experiences IRL this year.

Avicus wise, it'd have to be first being introduced to the AV community. If it weren't for Pop and Michael, I wouldn't be an active user on TS and the forums, I wouldn't have given Skype a second chance (gg viruses), I would never have applied for staff and I wouldn't have met so many amazing friends. I have a lot to thank them for. c:
replies.body_tagged:
I had heaps of brilliant experiences IRL this year.

Avicus wise, it'd have to be first being introduced to the AV community. If it weren't for Pop and Michael, I wouldn't be an active user on TS and the forums, I wouldn't have given Skype a second chance (gg viruses), I would never have applied for staff and I wouldn't have met so many amazing friends. I have a lot to thank them for. c:

replies.body:
Theres too many but I'll state a few

*However many skype calls Cacal/friends I've been part of-Insane shit done

*Being on TS and chilling with some of the community

*When we lost to Bezerk in 3 and a half mins in TOC and no one knew what to say and I'm like "well fuck"

*On a religious note, seeing God was incredible and scary, but I'd imagine even more scary for Tazz

There's so many more memories but these are just a few.
